TextView.android:text: 1. Word Ending-hood The word ending-tood is represented by a disjoined a. Spell: n-a-b-r-hood, neighborhood
2. Word Ending -ward The word ending-ward is also represented by a disjoined d. Spell: o-n-ward, onward
3. Ul Ul is represented by oo when it precedes a forward or upward stroke. Spell: re-s-ul-t, result
4. Quantities and Amounts Here are a few more helpful abbreviations for quantities and amounts.
Observe that the n for hundred is written under the figure as a positive distinction from million, in which the m is written beside the figure.
